entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 08 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 08 January 2023
